support.text: Helsinki e-commerce support team will answer you questions or problems related to the payment of at {{email}}. We will respond to your questions within two business days. In matters related to the service, the boat berths' own customer service Boating will help you.

checkout.general-description: You are about to order the following products

phone.label: Telephone number
phone.helper-text: If you want to, enter your telephone number in the format +358401234567

name.label: Company or entity name *
name.helper-text: Enter the official name of the company or organization here

ovtId.label: EDI code
ovtId.helper-text: Enter the e-invoice address here, if you wish

terms.cb-label: I have read and hereby accept the terms and conditions applied to this order
terms.cb-error: Accept the terms of service before making your payment.

contract.subscription-label: <1>General terms and conditions</1> applied to subscriptions

payment-methods.choose-payment-method-info: Select one of the following payment methods and click on ‘Next’.
payment-methods.no-payment-methods-info: Payment methods are not available right now. Please try again in a moment.

subscription-terms.cb-label: I have read and accept <1>the general terms and conditions</1> for recurring subscriptions.
subscription-terms.cb-error: Accept the terms before making your payment

visma-pay.information: The payment intermediary for the online store is Visma Pay. For more information on the payment intermediary, please see the <1>About the service</1> page.

paytrail.information: The payment intermediary for the online store is Paytrail. For more information on the payment intermediary, please see the <1>About the service</1> page.

notification.label: Receipt sent
notification.description: We have sent a confirmation message to your email {{email}}. You can also check and print the information here.

update-card.prefix: If you would like to update the payment card you have associated with the order below, click ‘Go to update’.
update-card.more-info-header: Information about updating your payment card
update-card.more-info-content: To update your payment card, you need to make a payment of €1 on your new card. The fee will only be authorised, and your payment card will not be charged. The authorisation hold may appear on your bank statement, but will be cancelled as soon as the card details have been verified.
update-card.card-update-success-content: Your payment card details have now been successfully updated.
update-card.card-update-failed-content: Your payment card detail update was interrupted, and the card details associated with your subscription have not been updated.

purchase.invalid-instant-purchase-link: No service or product could be found via the link you used. Please return to the service and try again.
purchase.invalid-instant-purchase-variables: The link you used is invalid. Please return to the service and try again.
purchase.not-valid-for-checkout: The order has already been paid

error.generic-error: Unfortunately, an error occurred and your order could not be processed normally. Please try again.

payment-cancelled.title: No payment has been charged
payment-cancelled.description: Payment interrupted, no payment has been charged
